newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt overnight, one-week rates on pound up.
newsitem.headline: Egypt overnight, one-week rates on pound up.

text.p: Overnight interbank rates on the Egyptian pound were slightly up on Tuesday in a very short private-sector market to between 10 1/4 and 10 3/8 percent from a range of 10 to 10 3/8 percent on Monday, bankers said.
They said one-week lending rates on the pound also increased marginally in a liquid market to between 10 3/8 and 10 7/16 percent from 10 1/4 to 10 3/8 percent on Monday.
Bankers said public sector banks maintained their minimum overnight lending rate at 10.5 percent.
